title: Consider covering EventSource logging with tests
body:
We currently don't test our `EventSource` event logging but it would be nice if we did. 

_Originally posted by @ladipro in https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/9777#issuecomment-1968567363_

nodes.body: The PR is merged: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9803 currently covers only one test for now
Unassigning myself, so it could be picked up if needed.
